DOC.detailed_description: Retrospective study 50 patient diagnosed nasopharyngeal carcinoma . The following variable study : age , sex , toxic habit , associate pathology , patient origin , first symptom , duration , histology , stage , second malignancy , recurrence , metastasis , treatment perform , response thereto survival .
